verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> was a child, <S%H5288><s%> then I loved <S%H157><s%> him, and called <S%H7121><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> out of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

As they called <S%H7121><s%> them, so <S%H3602><s%> they went <S%H1980><s%> from them: they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to Baalim, <S%H1168><s%> and burned <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H6999><s%> to graven <S%H6456><s%> images.
I taught <S%H8637><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> also to go, <S%H8637><s%> taking <S%H3947><s%> them by their arms; <S%H2220><s%> but they knew <S%H3045><s%> not that I healed <S%H7495><s%> them.

I drew <S%H4900><s%> them with cords <S%H2256><s%> of a man, <S%H120><s%> with bands <S%H5688><s%> of love: <S%H160><s%> and I was to them as they that take <S%H7311><s%> off <S%H5921><s%> the yoke <S%H5923><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> their jaws, <S%H3895><s%> and I laid <S%H5186><s%> meat <S%H398><s%> to them.

He shall not return <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall be his king, <S%H4428><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they refused <S%H3985><s%> to return. <S%H7725><s%>

And the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall abide <S%H2342><s%> on his cities, <S%H5892><s%> and shall consume <S%H3615><s%> his branches, <S%H905><s%> and devour <S%H398><s%> them, because of their own counsels. <S%H4156><s%>

And my people <S%H5971><s%> are bent <S%H8511><s%> to backsliding <S%H4878><s%> from me: though they called <S%H7121><s%> them to the most <S%H5920><s%> High, <S%H5920><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> at <S%H3162><s%> all <S%H3162><s%> would exalt <S%H7311><s%> him.

How <S%H349><s%> shall I give <S%H5414><s%> you up, Ephraim? <S%H669><s%> how shall I deliver <S%H4042><s%> you, Israel? <S%H3478><s%> how <S%H349><s%> shall I make <S%H5414><s%> you as Admah? <S%H126><s%> how shall I set <S%H7761><s%> you as Zeboim? <S%H6636><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> within me, my repentings <S%H5150><s%> are kindled <S%H3648><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

I will not execute <S%H6213><s%> the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of my anger, <S%H639><s%> I will not return <S%H7725><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> Ephraim: <S%H669><s%> for I am God, <S%H410><s%> and not man; <S%H376><s%> the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you: and I will not enter <S%H935><s%> into the city. <S%H5892><s%>

They shall walk <S%H3212><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> he shall roar <S%H7580><s%> like a lion: <S%H738><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he shall roar, <S%H7580><s%> then the children <S%H1121><s%> shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> from the west. <S%H3220><s%>

They shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> as a bird <S%H6833><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and as a dove <S%H3123><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria: <S%H804><s%> and I will place <S%H3427><s%> them in their houses, <S%H1004><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Ephraim <S%H669><s%> compasses <S%H5437><s%> me about with lies, <S%H3585><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with deceit: <S%H4820><s%> but Judah <S%H3063><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> rules <S%H7300><s%> with God, <S%H430><s%> and is faithful <S%H539><s%> with the saints. <S%H6918><s%>
